title: Error installing from source with a non-root user: file cannot create directory: /THNN.
body_html:
On Ubuntu 16.06 with Python 3.6, cmake 3.5.1 from the system:

I am running the python command from a virtualenv in my home folder therefore I do not sudo:

$ export NO_CUDA=1
$ python setup.py install
[...]
[100%] Built target THNN
Install the project...
-- Install configuration: "Release"
-- Installing: /home/ogrisel/code/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib/libTHNN.so.1
-- Up-to-date: /home/ogrisel/code/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib/libTHNN.so
CMake Error at cmake_install.cmake:73 (file):
  file cannot create directory: /THNN.  Maybe need administrative privileges.

On Ubuntu 16.06 with Python 3.6, cmake 3.5.1 from the system:

I am running the python command from a virtualenv in my home folder therefore I do not sudo:

```
$ export NO_CUDA=1
$ python setup.py install
[...]
[100%] Built target THNN
Install the project...
-- Install configuration: "Release"
-- Installing: /home/ogrisel/code/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib/libTHNN.so.1
-- Up-to-date: /home/ogrisel/code/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib/libTHNN.so
CMake Error at cmake_install.cmake:73 (file):
  file cannot create directory: /THNN.  Maybe need administrative privileges.
```
